content: The folder hierarchy in Thunderbird directly reflects the folder hierarchy in the filesystem within the profile folder. There is no mechanism to make a folder that's not within Local Folders in the filesystem to appear as if it was in the folder pane.
creator: DavidGG

content: Actually, I haven't tried, but a symbolic link might work.
creator: DavidGG
